long_description: For superb core warmth on your alpine adventures, you can't beat the men's Patagonia Ultralight Down Vest. Its slim silhouette of 800-fill-power down weighs in at a mere 5 oz. Nylon ripstop shell fabric is the toughest, lightest-weight fabric Patagonia has ever used for down garments. Deluge(R) durable water repellent finish helps bead up light precipitation. Premium 800-fill-power European goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Variegated channel construction stabilizes insulation and allows the use of less down, creating an elegant, low-profile vest. Slim, thermally efficient silhouette and drawcord hem seal in warmth. Patagonia Ultralight Down Vest for men offers zippered handwarmer pockets. Stuff sack included.
short_description: For superb core warmth on your alpine adventures, you can't beat the men's Patagonia Ultralight Down Vest. Its slim silhouette of 800-fill-power down weighs in at a mere 5 oz.
